comments.html:
For this use case, Cisco has developed LISP with PUBSUB and automated with SDA. Now as most of LISP is IETF standard, anyone could do the same even in an interoperable way.

This has a high performance to mobility.

In the latest Cisco Live presentation you can see the performance comparisons between LISP and BGP mobility. However, as CPU capacity growing, the different might diminish. That is one of the reasons that now Cisco support EVPN/BGP fully as alternative to SDA/LISP.
